ValidationRule.description: It is an error if Card Type (Control) is either "Driver & Vehicle" or "Vehicle Only" AND Vehicle Registration is empty
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(AU_Vehicle_Registration__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(AU_Card_Type__c, 'Vehicle Only'), ISPICKVAL(AU_Card_Type__c, 'Driver & Vehicle') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Vehicle Registration must be entered if Vehicle chosen in Card Type (Control)
